response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am more than willing to consider your interest. Given its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects a fair compromise between its true value and my expectations. Should you decide to proceed, we can arrange for a detailed inspection and discuss any additional terms that might be beneficial for both parties. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
